About Me

I'm a self taught web developer and designer based in central Arkansas. I am currently freelancing. When I'm not developing for the web I like to brew beer, roast coffee, and make games in Unity.

Skills

Languages

HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, jQuery, C#, Python, Ruby (on Rails)

Tools and Expertise

Git, Responsive Web Design, Game Development, Backend Programming
